item.title: Eric Adams’s Charges Were Dropped, but His Re-Election Chances Remain Dim
item.description: Even with the dismissal of a five-count federal corruption indictment, Mayor Eric Adams faces an uncertain future.

item.title: Val Kilmer in ‘Batman Forever’ Was a True 1990s Moment
item.description: The actor took only one turn in the famous batsuit. That film, “Batman Forever,” couldn’t be a more representative artifact of its era.
